ProductInfo.Features:
1) Dual band, Network: GSM900 / 1800MHz 2) Single SIM Card 3) Display Size : 1.3 inch touch screen 4) Ringtones Type : Polyphonic / MP3
5) Audio File format : MP3 / MIDI 6) Video File format : 3GP / MPEG4 (AVI) / MP4 7) Image File format : JPEG / BMP / GIF 8) E-book format : TXT

13) Support Video recorder, Sound recorder 14) Messaging : SMS / MMS 15) Built in 505KB memory, Support TF Card, Max 4GB. 16) Languages (option): English, Spanish, Russian, Indonesian , Polish , Italian , Persian , Arabic, Thai, German, French , Portuguese , Arabic, Greek
17) Other function: Calendar / Alarm / Calculator / E-book reader / Currency converter / World Clock / Tasks 18) Dimension: 52x41x13mm 19) li-ion battery: 3.7V 350mAh 20) Weight: 57g (including battery) 21) Talk Time: 2 hours 22) Standby time: 72 hours
